name: 3D Ball Platformer
description:
A short 3 level platformer where you play as a ball and have to fight against its physics to traverse and all 3 of the levels.

There are also a hidden coin on each level that can be optionally collected!

The controls are a snap and easy to use: WASD for movement, M2 for jumping, Move mouse to look around.

You can also hold M1 to move forward.

I may possibly add more levels in the future if i feel like it.
